rep+ for one who help me

item.title: Godwars interface
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

addText(16211, "NPC killcount", wid, 1, 0xff9040);
addText(16212, "Armadyl kills", wid, 1, 0xff9040);
addText(16213, "Bandos kills", wid, 1, 0xff9040);
addText(16214, "Saradomin kills", wid, 1, 0xff9040);
addText(16215, "Zamorak kills", wid, 1, 0xff9040);
addText(16216, "0", wid, 1, 0x66FFFF);//armadyl
addText(16217, "0", wid, 1, 0x66FFFF);//bandos
addText(16218, "0", wid, 1, 0x66FFFF);//saradomin
addText(16219, "0", wid, 1, 0x66FFFF);//zamorak

And

c.sendQuest("                          0", 16216);
c.sendQuest("                          0", 16217);
c.sendQuest("                          0", 16218);
c.sendQuest("                          0", 16219);
c.sendQuest("                  NPC killcount", 16211);
c.sendQuest("                  Armadyl kills:", 16212);
c.sendQuest("                   Bandos kills:", 16213);
c.sendQuest("                Saradomin kills:", 16214);
c.sendQuest("                  Zamorak kills:", 16215);

The 16212 ect. Is the position the text is on the screen. Change that number to move it.

Read full topic
